fields.value: Replication Code for: How do Economic Circumstances Determine Preferences? Evidence from Long-run Panel Data

dsDescriptionValue.value:
Replication code for "How do Economic Circumstances Determine Preferences?
Evidence from Long-run Panel Data", Tom O'Grady, accepted Feb 2017.

Please note that the data used in the paper - from the Swiss Household Panel Survey - requires a user license, meaning that I cannot share the data publicly. However, the data is available for free to any researcher after signing an agreement. See http://forscenter.ch/en/our-surveys/swiss-household-panel for details on how to gain access. The code below allows anyone to reproduce all of the figures and tables in the manuscript, starting with the publicly-available data files from the SHP

files.description: This creates the final dataset for the paper, using the SHP's publicly available files, as well as creating results for the tables. The figures were created in R
files.label: BJPS Replication Code - stata.do

dataFile.description: This creates the final dataset for the paper, using the SHP's publicly available files, as well as creating results for the tables. The figures were created in R

files.description: This File Creates all of the Figures in the paper, using the dataset created in stata
files.label: BJPS Replication Figures - R.R

dataFile.description: This File Creates all of the Figures in the paper, using the dataset created in stata
